website_summaries.verdict: With its large accessories kit, the Grand Walk-In Kitchen is better equipped than a lot of real kitchens! It has sturdy plastic construction and tons of features.
pros: The Step2 Grand Walk-In Kitchen is made from sturdy plastic
It has everything a young chef could possibly want in a play kitchen, including appliances that light up and make realistic noises
It even has a little bar for seating
cons: The kitchen may take a while to assemble - a power drill is almost a necessity
The kitchen also does not have a lot of storage space for the accessories

customer_reviews.title: Very good baseline.  I compared to toys r us and this one wins hands down.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Was easy and the sticker quality was great. I did some upgrades hehe. Best toy I have ever bought for my daughter. I would suggest doing the upgrades in my pictures to make storage a little bit easier and the chain across the spice rack helped keep the toys in place. Just went to target and got the hooks for like 2 bucks and the chain was from Lowe's in the metal section and just got 4 washers and 4 screws and bam 2 rail guards for the spice rack.. Oh the spice rack came from Lowe's too and did the same for chain just 2 screws and 2 washers.
customer_reviews.author: jeff crawford

customer_reviews.title: Playset itself is great, but the setup is a nightmare...
customer_reviews.text: The kids love the set, there's no question about that. Very detailed, lots of accessories... 5 stars. But the build itself was one if the worse experiences I've ever had building a kid's toy in my life. Took hours, the instructions literally have no writing, just small, poor black & white photos. They expect you to get the screw driver into small areas, where you have literally no leverage to drive the screws through un-pre-drilled plastic. It was torture, I'd rather have three vasectomies than build this ever again. The manufacturer is sadistic. -3 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: TPJR

customer_reviews.title: Horrible design!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying we have other Step 2 products... and we love them for what we use them for. For example, the toy boxes and another kitchen set we bought. However, this product came and was the worst to assemble and some of the pieces were really cheaply made and were bent, like the top to the grill was the worst. Some holes that were needed were also missing. About halfway into forcing pieces together, I thought about the price and decided it definitely wasn’t worth it! I repackaged it and sent it back! I will never buy this again. I’m hoping we just had bad luck and received a defective and poorly made one, but doubtful.
customer_reviews.author: AddictedtoAmazon

customer_reviews.title: I can often find our teenage daughter playing with our toddler in this kitchen and both seem to love it. My only complaint is wi
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because our two year old frequently wants to help in the kitchen. Be warned this is a large play set and will not fit through a doorway once assembled. There are a lot of play areas to this kitchen to keep our little one occupied. I can often find our teenage daughter playing with our toddler in this kitchen and both seem to love it. My only complaint is with respect to the available storage spaces in the play set. Considering its size, I would have expected there to be more space to put 'things' when it comes time to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: BusyMom

customer_reviews.title: Looks used, scratches all over, damaged
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged, scratches all over. This product in particular has negative reviews everywhere in the last couple of years, but has all positive reviews prior to that. Looks like the manufacturer is out of new stock and is trying to sell all the used/ returns as new ones. Bad purchase.
customer_reviews.author: manyvan2000

customer_reviews.title: Came VERY dirty but daughter LOVES IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Came VERY dirty and in damaged boxes. I had to clean the whole thing and some still didn’t come clean but I wasn’t about to try to figure out how to send it back. Also I had to bend the barbecue cover to make it work. My daughter LOVES IT and plays with it at least 2 hours a day (we’ve had it a few months now). The storage situation isn’t great as everything kind of falls out, so I cut the tops off a couple cardboard half gallon milk containers and they work great in the cupboards to contain the items. Glad I purchased it. It was well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product!! Normally this brand does well but this is a piece!! Pieces didn’t fit together, holes weren’t pre-drilled, and even the stickers were not normal. No normal mustard and ketchup. Set up looked easy enough but when pieces don’t fit together it’s frustrating. What the heck step 2!!!! If I’m spending this kind of money on a toy it better be good. I wouldn’t even spend $50 on this piece of trash!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mcgillhenning

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen for Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is good in regards to th he design, the decals, and accessories. My son loves playing with all the different items that are included. The kitchen has several components that make noise that definitely engage younger kids. You definitely get your money's worth with all the accessories you get my only complaint is the parts do not easily connect which effect the sturdiness. The top beams connect to areas where the plastic holes do not align at all. I am able to rig it to make them stay in place but ideally it's not what I would have preferred to have to do.
customer_reviews.author: LWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Built cheapish. Big footprint. Nice anti fatigue mat.
customer_reviews.text: During assembly it seems like it was made as cheap as possible. Easy assembly 1 person but you need tools. Drill and rubber mallet. The stickers make it look better but I hope they don’t get ripped off. It came missing the braces for the floor. I think step 2 sends you missing parts for free though. The floor is a great anti fatigue mat. Kid loves it he’s 2. It takes up more space than I realized. You have to have room to walk around it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: All the kids love this!
customer_reviews.text: All the kids love this!!! Everything opens, the sounds that the stove and BBQ make are cute and so realistic. I took the hint from another review and secured a chain across the open shelves so the food does not fall off the shelves. I also secured 2 wire baskets on the outside by the BBQ to hold the little plastic sauce bottles. Best investment ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Wrong stickers, but AWESOME product!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this kitchen set! So many awesome parts. Putting it together wasn't fun, but it stays together AMAZINGLY! I gave it 4 stars because we got cinnamon, pepper and other spice stickers instead of mustard amd ketchup. I've tried to call customer service to fix it, but no one answers.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Update 2020...kitchen still holding up very well. Cabinets, drawers, baskets, stickers are still is great shape. The counter has started to bow just a little as the kids love to climb on the kitchen. Lots of kids playing at once, 2 inside, a couple around the outside with plenty of room. Absolutely recommend. Purchused Nov 2015.. Great kids kitchen! This has and is still holding up to the abuse of, now 5 and 3 years old, children. It Really is a very high quality piece just off our dinning room and is played in every day. Yes, I would recommend it...
customer_reviews.author: JNS

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen
customer_reviews.text: My daughters 2 and 4 love this kitchen. I was trying to find one big enough for 2 or more kids to play without it being too big and taking up too much space. It's a great size for a playroom and has so many extras. The quality of the food, pots pans, utensils etc are great. They look realistic and they're very well made. It wasn't too hard to put together either. My husband used a drill and I did it within 30 minutes. Do what another reviewer did and find a better way to store the food. That's the only flaw but it's not that much of an issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: LaceyLee

customer_reviews.title: I clearly got a returned set
customer_reviews.text: There are missing pieces and the 2 roof pieces don’t fit at all! I’m contacting the manufacturer as I want to keep this, but if they don’t make it right by sending the correct pieces and missing parts then I’ll request a refund. It’s hard to tell your child that Santa forgot to bring your cabinet door, microwave and roof though :/
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S

customer_reviews.title: Cute but a little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 grandbaby's for Christmas (6, 4 and 2). I put it together by myself with a few minor incidents. Thankfully, the bottom panels were already assembled, doors and such were put on; however, the doors under the little grill area would not close and the grill cover is lop sided as well. Also, once the batteries are in the little telephone, you can barely hear the ring. Hopefully my little 6 year old will be comfortable playing in it because I thought it was a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Soto

customer_reviews.title: I only received a few pieces of the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: So I only received one box with half the kitchen in it. Pretty much it was just the awning in the box and the box itself wasn’t taped up. I’m wondering if there was supposed to be a second box to come with it but ups and amazon have given me the run around so I just requested a refund. It’s been ridiculous from the missed shipment date.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy it again
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were not clear and it is difficult to put together. It is not sturdy. I fact the first time my daughter opened the lid on the BBQ it broke. The storage areas with doors are ok but the shelf’s everything falls off. That being said we are using it and my Daughter really enjoys playing with it. Also it’s awesome that it comes with some dishes and food items.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Walker

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to install with power tools
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t recommend going about assembly with just a good old screwdriver. you’ll be awhile without a powered drill. But overall undamaged and hours of fun. it really needs more storage built in. it come with a TON of plastic foods that are great but you’ll need a bin or something to store them because there’s very little room incorporated into the design of the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our one year old and she uses it everyday. Like other reviews say, it’s a bit of a hassle to get it together but once it’s built it’s pretty awesome. Very large but it’s definitely something kids can grow into. Update 6/21/19 - grill cover broke off but has not stopped daily play. Still a hit over a year later! Update 3/10/2020 - still just as awesome! Added another kid to the playing and it is still used daily. Absolutely worth the price. 2.5 and 1 year olds can’t get enough.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Even after a few issues I'm really happy with the finished product
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves this kitchen. The pieces didn't go together real well but once it was finished it was worth it. We had some trouble with getting the wrong box numbers. Luckily I ordered it in plenty of time before Christmas. Even after a few issues I'm really happy with the finished product. My daughter got it when she was 15 months old. She is now almost 2 years old and still loved it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Janosik

customer_reviews.title: So cute, missing a couple pieces out of the box
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old boy and 5 year old girl love this. It was easy enough to put together by myself, good instructions. The only problem I had was it was missing the pieces that hold the floor mat in place and I didn't realize it until I was almost done assembling it.
customer_reviews.author: Quirkymama23

customer_reviews.title: My Kid Loves It... But
customer_reviews.text: The instructions don't exactly match up with how to do this. You'll definitely need a power drill and a specialized thin philips screwdriver to finish this on your own. Would I buy it again? Probably, my son gets a ton of play time out of it, but again the assembly isn't for the faint of heart.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: After a year it’s still in great shape. The grill hood attachment is the weak link and doesn’t hold up well so we just took it off
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely horrible
customer_reviews.text: I cant even get mine set up, nothing lines up how it is supposed to or snaps down all the way, I have had 3 people come help thinking it was just me but they said it was a horrible design as well, complete waste of my money now I have disappointed children and I cant send it back since I ordered it awhile ago for my daughters birthday and got rid of the box
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Purchases
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter is 18 months old and she absolutely loved this kitchen. she still has many more years to enjoy it. I am so glad that we did not wait to order this. also for the price we couldn't go wrong. one suggestion is make sure that you have a drill because the holes are not pre drilled to where you can use a screw driver. we have held off on giving her some of the food and pots that it comes with but what's even better is when she's a little older she can have those and actually pretend like she's cooking. right now she stands inside and plays with everything. She absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love and as you can see both toddlers fit and play with easy. Also very sturdy, my toddlers try to climb it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is in love with this kitchen
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in love with this kitchen. It was rather difficult to put together, not challenging but did take 5 hours with 2 people and I did use a drill which wasn't required but did speed things along. All of the sounds and interaction make this great, there's a lot of pieces which isn't a flaw but was a good means to teach our daughter to pick-up her toys. Our daughter is 3 and couldn't be happier with this.
customer_reviews.author: JDCalVino

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice kitchen. Comes with alot of accessories. Was easy to put together. Kids really enjoy it. It is very big and takes up a big chunk of soace so make sure you have some space set aside for it. I do not feel it should be as expensive as it is but i do love it and am glad i bought it for my 3 year old sons bday.
customer_reviews.author: Tory

customer_reviews.title: Bog Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Such an amazing toy, my grandson loves it and he doesn't play with a lot of toys other than his wooden puzzles, it comes with everything they need to play, it's very big but it have a grill also we were going to buy him a separate grill but I found it together and love this.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy M Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter LOVES it. However, I would suggest having a power tool to put the screws in. The instructions say you can do it by hand but your hand will be exhausted by the time your halfway through if you do. Also, the flooring is a bit flimsy. I expected a hard floor not a foam padding.
customer_reviews.author: Vidalia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy! Adult loves it too lol
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality and Super Durable! Unfortunately my kids like to try to use it as a jungle gym! Looks exactly like the image and has awesome little details. My 5 yr old and 18 month old love it and play in it together.
customer_reviews.author: macy mcdowell

customer_reviews.title: One year old loves this.  Will
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in two separate boxes on back to back days. Assembled the next day. Better than imagined. My one year old grandson was in awe. Absolutely loved it. Like Christmas morning !! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome kitchen,
customer_reviews.text: A pretty awesome gift for my grand baby. Was a bit of a pain to put together on Christmas eve. Definitely want good screwdrivers and where you can pre drill some of the holes. The stickers were all there and are quite decorative. It comes with lots of plastic food and utensils. kind of small and they can get underfoot, but that is to be expected with a 1.5 year old. But she loves it and plays in it often.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Schafer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! Love the padded floor, the skillet and grill that make noise. Wish the microwave door opened and that the grill didn’t knock over the pots and pans when opened- but just minor things. My husband put it together in a few hours- not too easy not too hard. Stickers were easy to put on. I wish there was a specific spot for the dishes, the fruits, veggies, etc- but that’s just OCD mom... my daughter is happy with everything spread out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comes with a ton of fake food!
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy to assemble. My 8 year old was climbing on the roof and it was sturdy enough for him to act crazy and surf on lol! Baby loves it. I didn’t put all the stickers on the outside because it gets really hot where I live and just wanted to avoid them getting all peely and raggedy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Decent
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad to put together. Some reviews said like 2-3 hours I got it together in about an hour. What I will highly recommend is the use of a cordless power drill to drive the screws in faster and easier. My little one loves and always makes me pretend coffee. Would be nice if the fridge, oven and microwave made noise too. I give it a 4 out of 5.
customer_reviews.author: JG.

customer_reviews.title: Mold may be uneven..
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his kitchen and grill set but the mold for the grill is off so I was unable to put the grill lid on. The piece where the grill top is supposed to go on is not only too low but it's also too long so the grill top doesn't fit. It took a little while to put together so I didn't want to order a new grill section and risk the same result. My husband plans to cut into the mold to make the grill top fit. I also did make sure the table top for the grill was pushed all the way down and was evenly placed.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmyn Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Great play set
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughters for Christmas! They loved it... hours of playtime and great for imagination. Shortly after Christmas my kids playroom flooded and that destroyed their play set so unfortunately I can’t speak to it standing up the test of time but for the short time we had it they loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Some features not here but still great buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this kitchen. She got it for Chris and plays in it every day. Th microwave doesn’t really have functioning buttons or the fridge but the bbq and rande tip do light up and make noise the phone makes noise too but not too loud was a good purchase overall because my daughter loves it she even likes to eat in there and play with her other toys like it’s a fort
customer_reviews.author: lizzy86

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived with damage and stains
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my only grandchild. So I was super excited to get it, put it together and have him enjoy. A few pieces arrived damaged or stained. I tried to remove red stain but it did not work. I love the product, its sturdy, a bit difficult to get the screws into odd little nooks but what really is upsetting is to spend almost $300 and the product arrived with damage and stains. It's too big to return and go through the hassle. I just thought customers should know it may not arrive in pristine conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this kitchen. It was not hard to put together. I did not use an of the screws as I wanted to be able to move it around if I needed to since we have a small space at the moment and it is very sturdy for my girls. I am happy with this buy. I did have a 2 screws missing to put the grey piece for the microwave on put not a big deal since the sticker still looks good without it.
customer_reviews.author: NyangFam

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect kitchen for my boys
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect kitchen for my boys! We put this kitchen together in about 45 minutes. After reading the reviews, I was concerned it would take us hours to put this together. We started 3 nights before Christmas. We had it mostly together the first night. Christmas Eve, we brought this up to do the final assembly. It took, maybe, five minutes. When you get this, lay out all of the pieces in a big space. Assemble the sides, attach the stickers, then kitchen to the area for final assembly. Easy peasy.
customer_reviews.author: tallbaker

customer_reviews.title: Mega kitchen, mega memories.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for any child but we purchased for our 2 and 3 year old. May have been an early purchase but it’s a quality product that will grow with him. We put together on Christmas Eve when we purchased it and it was a tad time consuming and tedious when assembling but consider the size and all it has to offer and it makes sense. Just allow time and patience and maybe a helper if assembling isn’t your favorite thing to do and this purchase will pay off for your kids and there imagination!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Huge kitchen set but extremely entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift, best gift for a toddler!! I will say only set back is the size of it. Love all the accessories It comes with and sounds it makes.
customer_reviews.author: Kat the Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: There are 2 boxes.
customer_reviews.text: So we didn’t get both boxes. There are two boxes we got one. Amazon was out of stock so they refunded us but it looks like it would be a cool kitchen. Just make sure you get both boxes!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this kitchen and so do my grandchildren and their friends as well. Its made well and there's so many things to play with, i.e., cabinets, sink, etc. drawers, and other items. So glad I got it for them.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn / Eva

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: I love this kitchen. It for us is an alternative to an outdoor playhouse and my 3 year old loves it. Pros: Sturdy, plenty of play area, grill, some working functions with battery, counter where you can add chairs. Cons: Flooring doesn't stay put too well, won't fit through a doorway once assembled, a pain to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Huber

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Lots of cubbies for storing dishes and ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Lots of cubbies for storing dishes and other goodies. We didn't attached the two pieces but put them side by side for more space for multiple children. The grill lid did come off (as expressed by others) but we just left it off. My grandkids play for hours!
customer_reviews.author: Catmama

customer_reviews.title: Happy little cook!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my granddaughter, who will be soon turning 2.....she absolutely loves it. Great quality and very sturdy. It took some time to put it together, which my daughter did, but totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's fine for what it is
customer_reviews.text: It's fine for what it is. My daughter loves it. Hate applying the stickers since it is basically impossible to align them perfectly. Kind of a pain to assemble and ours didn't come with the floor piece. Was too lazy to bother contacting support to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Great play piece for a back yard for littles.
customer_reviews.text: The kitchen-grill concept is fun and versatile for our grandkids to enjoy. We have bought them as gifts and even one for our house. All of our grandchildren play with it. Assembly isn't bad, maybe 1 hour or so. We have ours in phoenix area back yard, and its durable against play and weather.
customer_reviews.author: Mark F

customer_reviews.title: Need a steady hand and 2 strong people to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Assembly includes a TON of stickers... need a steady hand to look nice. Took my husband and I pushing and pulling to align some of the screws with pilot holes and it wasn't easy.
customer_reviews.author: Adrea

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My son can not get enough of his kitchen! He and his friends play in this constantly. It is easy to assemble, not difficult to move, extremely sturdy, amazing colors and features (the grill, open for the microwave, oven and fridge, etc). The food and other items that come with the kitchen are great products. We would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Rusti Grandstaff

customer_reviews.title: Our 19 month old absolutely LOVES this kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Our 19 month old absolutely LOVES this kitchen! Assembly is a little challenging due to the positioning of some of the screws, but you can make it happen.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Time consuming to put together
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves it. I didn't put the stickers on it because I think in the weather they start looking bad after a while. Easy to hose off when it gets dirty
customer_reviews.author: Deborah MyersMyers

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty big and my daughter loves it. It's pretty sturdy but they send you a lot of cheap self tapper screws. Screws need more than two thin pieces of plastic to grab onto. But so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Smith

customer_reviews.title: I bought this kitchen for Christmas for my kids. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kitchen for Christmas for my kids. Half the parts are missing and all the phone numbers that are listed for me to call for help on are not working. So my kids didn't get their big Christmas gift and I have no idea how to fix it since Step 2 has no working phone number apparently.
customer_reviews.author: RyeCatcher

customer_reviews.title: Cabinets are subpar, poor design
customer_reviews.text: The cabinets are not easy to Open and close. The handles on the refrigerator, The storage area beneath the grill, microwave and oven are a bit hard to grab and open. Also the grill cover is a terrible design and always comes off. We found it to be sturdy so far for something positive to say.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy assemble
customer_reviews.text: Love this I live in apartment and I thought it was going to take up a lot of space but it was actually a good size my kid loves it very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Teresa D.

customer_reviews.title: The girls ages 2&4 love it! Perfect size for them nowand for sure ...
customer_reviews.text: The girls ages 2&4 love it! Perfect size for them nowand for sure a couple more years. A problem though was 2 pieces were broke off (one stove handle and one of the hooks over sink area), not really sure either of why a battery was needed in one area??? Unless that broken handle triggers something) and the connection was quite difficult wirh 2 of the dude pieces. Once together they looked ok
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: How do I replace tiny wrong item?
customer_reviews.text: See attached photo. Live this product I just didn’t get the correct stickers. We should have received catsup mustard relish, etc but received spice stickers instead. How do I get the correct ones. I do not want to send this back.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Zarate

customer_reviews.title: Questionable
customer_reviews.text: Product packaging was terrible and seemed as though it was perviously put together ie..holes already drilled, things already attached, almost like we got someones returned item.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Samic

customer_reviews.title: Fun play Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for 3 year old. He loves it. It's great, lots of options, durable, sturdy, took about an hour with 2 people putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Miller

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece. No fridge door.
customer_reviews.text: Love this kitchen. Only giving 3 stars because I'm super disappointed that they didnt give me a fridge door at all in the boxes it came in. I paid for a part I never received so that frustrates me. Had I of gotten all parts I should have I would of given a 5 star review. It's such a nice kitchen and my 1 and 2 year old son both absolutely love it
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old is in love
customer_reviews.text: My little girl got it from Santa and she is obsessed with it! So cute! It did take a while to assemble but was worth it to my Bc I knew my little one was going to love it!
customer_reviews.author: kelley raychel lane

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to allow for twins to play and not feel squished in the kitchen. Has so many accessories we lost count, a very good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Wright

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed because this cost a lot
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited getting this about for some reason box 1 was shipped across the other side of the world but box 2 was shipped to the right address. Loves everyone but stickers are not the right stickers according to the pictures and stuff. The holes were not even drilled in right so I can’t place half the stuff where it’s suppose to be. Really disappointed because this cost a lot :( was for my sons 2nd birthday. Still going to use it but would like to get my moneys worth.
customer_reviews.author: Christina pausch

customer_reviews.title: Mesmerizing play
customer_reviews.text: They are so happy with there kitchen, 4 year old and 2. What a gift to challenger there minds and keep them occupied. The most fun is watching them.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lobato

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: First time putting together was a little difficult, definitely recommend using a drill instead of a screwdriver. Other then that my kids love it, very sturdy have 4 kids ages 7, 4, and 2. And they climb all over it.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Play Kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Step2 Kitchen for my grandsons, age 3 1/2 and 2. They love it. My daughter is thrilled because it has enough accessories and counter space that they can both play together (with no fighting). Very sturdy, the 2 year old climbs all over it. I was a little disappointed with the layout of the storage. With a little more thought Step2 could have made the storage sizes better fit the cookware and groceries. Still I give it 5 Stars
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pretend playtime for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves it. I wasn’t the one assembling it, but seems to be sturdier and better put together than the smaller version.
customer_reviews.author: sma5320874

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it! Assembly was HORRIBLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely love it and can play in it all day but this was an absolute nightmare to put together. I think I am somewhat handy and took me 3 hours to put together and the directions were an Absolute joke.
customer_reviews.author: Sal U

customer_reviews.title: Very nice toy kitchen but difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very nice toy kitchen but difficult to assemble. I bet the designer has never assembled one.
customer_reviews.author: ToThePoint

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: The holes and the parts were not in sync .. So called the step 2 customer service .. They asked me to take pictures of the defective parts and said they would send it to quality team ..very bad quality and very bad service .. I recommend not to purchase this product .
customer_reviews.author: Sudha

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase. Not like other step 2 products
customer_reviews.text: It was damaged in places and looked unfinished. Half the stickers were missing and hardware was missing. Such a disappointment. Was really looking forward to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jdnaas

customer_reviews.title: Break out the drill!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old granddaughter loves it. Beware that a drill would come in handy putting this together as none of the areas that the screws go are pre drilled.
customer_reviews.author: rachel johnson

customer_reviews.title: Ruined christmas
customer_reviews.text: Ruined my daughters christmas. Spent $175 to only get half the kitchen! An absolute joke! This was ny toddlers big present and now she has nothing and we'll have to deal with returning it amd waiting to see if the replacement comes with ALL of the kitchen. A complete disappointment and very inconvenient when you pay that much for a toy!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby B Yoder

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for a two year old girl
customer_reviews.text: The was even better than it appeared in the picture. Our two year old granddaughter loves playing with it. So many fun parts to it.
customer_reviews.author: Sew busy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler absolutly loves this big walk-in kitchen! Asembly was pretty easy and it's as sturdy as such toys can be.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson got this when he was 1 and still continues to use it at 2.5 yrs
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: Love this as a first kitchen. Only giving 4 stars due to one of the knobs were broken off when it arrived and it was slow getting here. The little oven top just sits in a hole so my daughter takes it out, would be better if it screwed in. The grill top is weakly place, if pulled up to high it pops off.
customer_reviews.author: KIMBERLY

customer_reviews.title: Bent
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in box that looked like it was run over by a truck. When putting it together, we could not attach the grill lid. We looked at the directions and noticed the piece the grill lid attaches to is completely bent!! There is absolutely no way to attach it. We assembled the rest and our kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing stickers-would have been a 5 had I gotten all stickers
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful item sturdy looks good. I was missing stickers never received after notifying.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Scott

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This set is not easy to assemble. I had to manipulate and bend the plastic pieces just to make some sections fit. Other sections I just gave up on and screwed in where they lay. My kids do play with this set but due to how hard it was to assemble I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Renius76

customer_reviews.title: Hours of make believe fun
customer_reviews.text: Grandchildren have had the most fun with this. Can be used inside or outside or porch/deck. Playfood, pots and pans included
customer_reviews.author: Amy Thacker

customer_reviews.title: 2yo best birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our baby girls 2nd birthday. She loves it. The directions were easy to follow on putting together. We couldn’t ask for better!
customer_reviews.author: G. Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Best birthday ever!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this kitchen as a gift for my two sons birthday who are 1 and 3 years old. My honest opinion on this kitchen is that it's one of the best toys my kids ever played with. My children are gaining memorization, organizing and management skills just by taking orders, cooking and cleaning up their kitchen which is so awesome! We've also had a playdate with a couple of other kids and the children were in that kitchen for hours. I am extremely happy with this purchase and will recommend it to parents who have small children that want to just get into doing grown up things.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my granddaughter who’s 2! She absolutely loves it!! Easy to put together. Variety of foods and pots n pans come with it. Adorable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 1/2 and 18 mo. Grandchildren LOVE their kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: This was a joint Birthday present for both my Grandchildren (they were born 2 yrs. and 1 day apart) They LOVE it and find they use it daily. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: V. Rossiter

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Amazing kitchen. Bought for my 13mo old and he loves it. He is so into it! I’m glad I bought it for him at this age. Everything is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best fully equipped kitchen for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Allow an hour of your time for assembly. But, instructions were straight forward and plan to have a philips screw driver handy! Kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: VERY DIFFICULT TO ASSEMBLE
customer_reviews.text: Looks adorable when complete, but was extremely difficult to assemble. Screws provided did not fit in some instances and we had to use a power drill to get them in, which was difficult in small crevices. Overall looks nice, a few of the pieces have scratches a very small dents. Plastic food and plates/cups a great addition.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: 3yrold and 1yrold love it and they play with it everyday
customer_reviews.author: Joana Corrales

customer_reviews.title: Awesome play station
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome playstation. Lots for the kids to do. I wish the microwave had operational buttons and made noises. It took my husband and I three hours to assemble and a drill is a must. But it was all worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Portia Mack

customer_reviews.title: Good but be cautious with assembily
customer_reviews.text: This is an impressive gift for a kid. It stands tall and has many features. However, the assembly was a disaster. The pre-cut holes were not big enough so I had to borrow power tools to make larger holes. This made the way longer then it was supposed to take.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Khordipour

customer_reviews.title: Such a great kitchen!!!
customer_reviews.text: I remember my step dad saying the instructions to put it together was not so friendly. But he managed to get it put up while we had our 2 year old out of the house! It was her surprise to come home to for her birthday! She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: GINA

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Piece broke off in less than one hour of putting together. The grill cover u open come right off. I called talked to some they said to take pictures, I did. They said would send me their email, didn't happen. I called back I was given run around. If I didn't already put together and recycled boxes came in would of returned. So not happy
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: bought this 3 years ago and it is still holding up great. Kids love it
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Tobey

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money they ask for!
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed! not worth 300 bucks! the kitchen is tiny looks better then it actually is, Never again! My daughter is 5 and has a great imagination, but this thing literally has no room for nothing must less two or more kids. thankfully it came with play food an dishes, that she plays with. I suggest ages 3 an under.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: The boxes were delivered and it seemed like one box was re-taped. Once we opened everything, we found out we were missing the main support pieces. Very disappointing for the amount of money we spent.
customer_reviews.author: Gianna Stutzman

product_meta.title: Step2 Grand Walk-In Kitchen & Grill | Large Kids Kitchen Playset Toy | Play Kitchen with 103-Pc Play Kitchen Accessories Set Included, Brown/Tan/Maroon (821400)
product_meta.description:
Everything a real kitchen has to offer is in this deluxe play kitchen set. The Grand Walk-In Kitchen & Grill™ features so many fun details and a large footprint that encourages social play with multiple children! Walk into the kitchen playset to discover the three-sided play area details, from the “stainless steel” appliance finishes and molded-in floor to the white cabinets, pull-out storage space, and extra-large countertop. Activate the realistic lights and sounds of the stovetop burner with the special cookware, then use the molded-in sink with swivel faucet to wash the dishes after the dinner party. Plus, this large pretend kitchen comes with a 103-piece assessor set for kids to immediately start meal prep for their next gathering. Kids can’t wait to get cooking and entertaining in their very own kitchen! Made in the USA of US and imported parts.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Grand Walk-In Kitchen and Grill brings a fresh, new look to one of our best-selling kitchens. It features an attached dining area that encourages multi-child play inside and out. The kitchen's realistic design includes electronic elements in the grill, stove top, and phone, and custom "stainless steel" appliances with plenty of valuable storage for its loads of accessories.
feature_bullets: Little chefs will want to entertain in this kids’ pretend kitchen Playset that features so many realistic amenities and multiple play stations for engaging social play!
Kid-friendly appliances, eat-in station, and barbeque grill features are just some of the ways this kitchen Playset delivers tons of fun with plenty of function.
Activate the fun lights and sounds on the stovetop and grill station for realistic kitchen play.
When playtime fun is done, All of the included accessories Store neatly in the cabinets, large refrigerator, and pull out bins!
In the box: play kitchen, 103-piece accessory set Including play food, cookware, and more!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars795 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
